name: Don't Starve: Shipwrecked
summary: Don’t let the tropical breeze lull you into a false sense of security - the world might be different, but it is still equal parts unforgiving and uncompromising. You will quickly find these islands are full to the brim with things that want to kill you.
info:
• 中文名: 饥荒：船难
  • 开发: Klei Entertainment
  • 游戏类型: 生存
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年12月2日
